title: Yfaat Weiss is Professor of Jewish History at the Hebrew University of Jerusalem, Director of the Leibniz Institute for Jewish History and Culture – Simon Dubnow, and Professor of Modern History, especially Jewish history, at Leipzig University. Her research interests include contemporary Jewish history with a focus on spatial history, material culture, and transfer of knowledge in the sphere of German language and Israeli history
